game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: A mysterious map leads you to an abandoned city, where you must discover the lost artifact and return it to the village elder.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a legendary weapon

task.description: Make your way through the forest and enter the ruins to begin your search.
Explore the ruins for any clues that might lead to the artifact's location.
A powerful guardian protects the artifact. Conquer it to claim the treasure.
